item.title: Raspberium
item.description: The best free terrarium/vivarium/aquarium controller for the Raspberry Pi. Features Built on Django Rest Framework Supports BME280 temperature/humidity/pressure sensor! Supports a fan(s)! Supports up to 4 relays out of the box. Easy to add more! It’s free! And AWESOME!
